projectTitle: SentiPulse: Physiological & Emotional State Monitoring System
description: A full-stack web application for real-time physiological (Heart Rate) and emotional state monitoring using non-contact video processing (rPPG) and facial expression analysis.

modules.name: Frontend Client
modules.description: React-based UI for video capture, upload, and result visualization.

modules.name: Backend Server
modules.description: Node.js/Express server handling API requests, file uploads, and Python process management.

modules.name: Signal Processing Service
modules.description: Python microservice for rPPG signal extraction and heart rate estimation using ICA/PCA.

modules.name: Emotion Analysis Service
modules.description: Facial expression recognition using the FER library.

modules.name: Evaluation Module
modules.description: Offline evaluation script for computing accuracy metrics against ground truth.

metrics.name: Heart Rate
metrics.definition: Beats per minute (BPM) estimated from facial blood flow changes.
metrics.justification: Primary physiological indicator of stress and arousal.

metrics.name: Emotion Probabilities
metrics.definition: Confidence scores for 7 basic emotions (angry, disgust, fear, happy, sad, surprise, neutral).
metrics.justification: Provides psychological context to the physiological data.

metrics.name: Wellbeing Score
metrics.definition: Composite score (-1 to 8) derived from HR bands and emotional affect balance.
metrics.justification: Synthesizes complex raw data into an actionable user-friendly metric.

metrics.name: Signal Quality (SNR)
metrics.definition: Signal-to-Noise Ratio of the rPPG signal in dB.
metrics.justification: Critical for assessing the reliability of the heart rate estimate.

metrics.name: Face Coverage
metrics.definition: Percentage of frames where a face was successfully detected.
metrics.justification: Indicates if the user remained in frame, affecting accuracy.
